abstract: Selection of three UConn women's basketball players in WNBA draft marks first time in any major sport that three payers from same school have been drafted in top three positions; other basketball news noted.

headline.print_headline: UConn’s Latest Sweep: The W.N.B.A. Draft
headline.main: UConn’s Latest Sweep: The W.N.B.A. Draft

snippet: Breanna Stewart led a University of Connecticut sweep of the first three picks in the W.N.B.A. draft, going first over all to the Seattle Storm.
lead_paragraph: Breanna Stewart led a University of Connecticut sweep of the first three picks in the W.N.B.A. draft, going first over all to the Seattle Storm.
